abstract: Israeli soldiers fatally shoot Palestinian man during violent confrontation at West Bank funeral procession.
lead_paragraph: Israeli soldiers shot the man after a funeral procession turned into a violent confrontation in the southern West Bank.

headline.main: Palestinian Said to Be Killed by Israeli Soldiers
headline.print_headline: Middle East; West Bank: Palestinian Is Said to Be Killed by Israelis

snippet: Israeli soldiers shot the man after a funeral procession turned into a violent confrontation in the southern West Bank.
